data.title: Facts and Figures
data.text:
History & Facts

Founded: 1926

Campus acreage: 270

Headmasters since founding: 4

Co-education begun: 1979

Faculty/student ratio: 1 to 5

Students

Budgeted Enrollment: 340*

Boarding: 70 percent

Day: 30 percent

Boys: 50 percent

Girls: 50 percent

Students of color (U.S.): 30 percent

*Does not include faculty children

Faculty

Graduate degrees: 80 percent

Total Teaching Faculty: 67

Admission

Inquiries: 2,308

Applications: 1,087

Finances

Endowment: $101,945,745

Boarding tuition: $77,100

Day tuition: $63,300

Financial aid assigned: $6,325,000

Average award: $51,000

Students on aid: 35 percent

Academics

Average class size: 11

Credits for diploma: 90

Credit courses: 161

Advanced Placement courses: 19

Computer/multimedia labs: 1

Makerspace: 1

Science laboratories: 8

Robotics lab: 1

Theaters: 2

Art/music rooms: 10

Writing Center: 1

Learning Center: 1

Athletics

Interscholastic sports: 15

Interscholastic teams: 46

Playing fields: 10 (1 turf)

Tennis courts: 8

Squash courts: 10

Boathouse: 1

Basketball courts: 2

Hockey rink: 1

Fitness center: 1

Wrestling room: 1

Rowing tanks: 2
